name: Melancholy Moyo
description:
Our entry in GGJ2019, introduction to unreal engine, with plenty of technical issues!

see our team in the link below, Danilo Ernie Josh Misty Kevin Rabecca Riley Sheridan Tye

If your player is invisible, download the moyopc zip below.

WASD, C to grab, Shift to Float, F to dash.   Cheat with 1,2,3,4

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/melancholy-moyo
